pages.text: 74|18|usane vichaar kiya aur anumaan lagaaya.
74|19|vah maara jaaye! phir usane kaisa anumaan lagaaya
74|20|phir (usapar allaah kee) maar! usane kaisa anumaan lagaaya
74|21|phir punah vichaar kiya.
74|22|phir maathe par bal diya aur munh bidora.
74|23|phir (saty se) peechhe phira aur ghamand kiya.
74|24|aur bola ki ye to pahale se chala aa raha hai, ek jaadoo hai.
74|25|ye to bas manushy[1] ka kathan hai.
74|26|main use sheeghr hee narak mein jhonk doonga.
74|27|aur aap kya jaanen ki narak kya hai.
74|28|na shesh rakhegee aur na chhodegee.
74|29|vah khaal jhulasa dene vaalee.
74|30|niyukt hain unapar unnees (rakshakh farishte).

74|31|aur hamane narak ke rakshak farishte hee banaaye hain aur unakee sankhya ko kaafiron ke lie pareeksha bana diya gaya hai. taaki vishvaas kar len ahle[1] kitaab aur badhen jo eemaan laaye hain eemaan mein aur sandeh na karen jo pustak diye gaye hain aur eemaan vaale aur taaki kahen ve jinake dilon mein (dvidha ka) rog hai tatha kaafir[2] ki kya taatpary hai allaah ka is udaaharan se? aise hee kupath karata hai allaah jise chaahata hai aur sammaarg darshaata hai, jise chaahata hai aur nahin jaanata hai aapake paalanahaar kee senaon ko usake siva koee aur tatha nahin hai ye narak kee charcha, kintu manushy kee shiksha ke lie.
74|32|aisee baat nahin, shapath hai chaand kee
74|33|tatha raatri kee, jab vyateet hone lage
74|34|aur praatah kee, jab prakaashit ho jaaye
74|35|vaastav mein, (narak) ek[1] bahut badee cheez hai.
74|36|daraane ke lie logon ko.
74|37|usake lie tumamen se, jo chaahe[1] aage hona athava peechhe rahana.
74|38|pratyek praanee apane karmon ke badale mein bandhak hai.
74|39|daahine vaalon ke siva.
74|40|ve svargon mein honge. ve prashn karenge.
74|41|aparaadhiyon se.
74|42|tumhen kya cheez le gayee narak mein.
74|43|ve kahengeh ham nahin the namaaziyon mein se.
74|44|aur nahin bhojan karaate the nirdhan ko.
74|45|tatha kured karate the kured karane vaalon ke saath.
74|46|aur ham jhuthalaaya karate the pratiphal ke din (pralay) ko.
74|47|yahaan tak ki hamaaree maut aa gaee.
